Text:
tank abbott vs oleg taktarov has no winner
it stopped in the middle of the fight haha

The first few clips are pretty interesting - no rounds, no gloves, and no rules! 

And yes, the tape runs out before the end on the abbott vs oleg taktarov fight. I would have like to see that - Taktarov has the coldest eyes I've ever seen.
...not to mention it was tournament style so the winner had fought as many as 5 fights in a night by the time he was declared champion.....real bloodsport style!
